definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: We have to recognize it and lessen the impact best we can, " said Gore.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須認清這一點並儘可能減輕其影響，”戈爾說。

sentences.english: We can not only become detached by realizing the true nature of things.
sentences.chinese: 只有斷去這些關聯，我們才能認清事物的本質。

sentences.english: The main reason for this is because the nature of enforcement power is not clearly understood.
sentences.chinese: 其主要原因在於沒有認清執行權的性質。

sentences.english: Apply the Peak Rule only after the Peak Day is identified.
sentences.chinese: 出現排卵時即認清峯日後，才運用峯日規則。

sentences.english: Understanding historic mission, Embodying life value and Repaying motherland by industries.
sentences.chinese: 認清歷史使命，體現人生價值，謀求產業報國。

sentences.english: This recognition will be helpful for clearing up the injustice of Yao Nai in Chinese literary history.
sentences.chinese: 認清這一點，有助於澄清我國文學史上的這樁冤案。

sentences.english: The value of the sericulture culture is the base of sericulture economy of modern days.
sentences.chinese: 認清蠶文化的價值是振興當代蠶業經濟的基礎。

sentences.english: The rewards of God, however, are immediately recognised as eternal.
sentences.chinese: 至於上主的賞報，你當下就能認清它的永恆性。

sentences.english: "Know thyself" is a bit of philosophical which hasbeen around for eons.
sentences.chinese: 認清自己是無數年來哲學上的問題。

sentences.english: Recognize your own biases and keep them in check.
sentences.chinese: 認清你自己的偏袒處來中立化你的言論。

sentences.english: Second, you must identify your mission in life.
sentences.chinese: 第二步，你必須認清自己的抱負。

sentences.english: I tell you that I am sure of it, and that I recognized him.
sentences.chinese: 告訴你，我準沒有看錯，我已認清了，是他。

sentences.english: Identify your weaknesses, then use your brain to outsmart them.
sentences.chinese: 認清你的弱點，然後用你的頭腦去戰勝它們。

sentences.english: Recognize your strengths, even if you have to list all of them down.
sentences.chinese: 認清你的長處，即便是這需要你列出一張清單來發現。

sentences.english: Getting a clear understanding of the situation and seizing opportunities, opening up a new prospect of the utilization of foreign funds.
sentences.chinese: 認清形勢，抓住機遇，努力開創利用外資工作新局面。

sentences.english: Always recognize the dreamlike qualities of life and reduce attachment and aversion. Practise good-heartedness toward all beings.
sentences.chinese: 隨時認清生活的如夢性質並減少愛取和嫌惡。

definition: to face squarely/to meet head on/to face up to
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
